strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Displays the latest xkcd comic on your desktop
strings.GADGET_ABOUT_TEXT:
xkcd Comics © 2007 Benjamin Schirmer Have the latest xkcd comic on your desktop.
You can click on an image to visit http://xkcd.com/
Get more information about this and my other gadgets at http://www.imagine-interactive.de/gadgets/
strings.strNoInternet: Could not load Feed. Are you connected to the internet?
